It's the third criminal case filed against Trump this year, but the first to try to hold him criminally responsible for his efforts to cling to power.

In a bid to prevent them being circumvented through Moscow's close ally Belarus, the European Council has fast-tracked a series of new restrictions targeting Minsk.
